card choices
2 SK cause they don't care about backrow removal or lockdown, could have been 1 only. Heavy knight at 1 cause we needed more monsters and if we can land a banish on dakini things can really get on our favor. 2 chalice cause 3 would be bricky, but at 2 the card is really good against every meta deck. 2 floods cause it is always good to have em and 2 pulses cause 3 would be bricky, and 2 is already risky if you open only SK and/or heavy knight
Also, MrHadouken wrote a super in depth guide that i recommend
